<title level="1" pfs="">[Ingnovim's Assistants](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1592)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Ingnovim's Assistants](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1592)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 40

**Perception** +29

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +33

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +2

**Con** +9

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 43 

**Fort** +32 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +29 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 330
([fast healing 20](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15))

</row>

**Immunities**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longsword_ +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 7d8+8 slashing

</column>
name: Ingnovim's Assistants
